00037 #ifndef _LUSTRE_DEBUG_H
00038 #define _LUSTRE_DEBUG_H
00039 
00045 #include <lustre_net.h>
00046 #include <obd.h>
00047 
00048 #define LL_CDEBUG_PAGE(mask, page, fmt, arg...)                         \
00049         CDEBUG(mask, "page %p map %p index %lu flags %lx count %u priv %0lx: " \
00050                fmt, page, page->mapping, page->index, (long)page->flags, \
00051                page_count(page), page_private(page), ## arg)
00052 
00053 #define ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB 60000ULL
00054 #define ASSERT_PAGE_INDEX(index, OP)                                    \
00055 do { if (index > ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT)) {         \
00056         CERROR("bad page index %lu > %llu\n", index,                    \
00057                ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << (20 - PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT));            \
00058         libcfs_debug = ~0UL;                                            \
00059         OP;                                                             \
00060 }} while(0)
00061 
00062 #define ASSERT_FILE_OFFSET(offset, OP)                                  \
00063 do { if (offset > ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << 20) {                           \
00064         CERROR("bad file offset %llu > %llu\n", offset,                 \
00065                ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << 20);                               \
00066         libcfs_debug = ~0UL;                                            \
00067         OP;                                                             \
00068 }} while(0)
00069 
00070 /* lib/debug.c */
00071 void dump_lniobuf(struct niobuf_local *lnb);
00072 int dump_req(struct ptlrpc_request *req);
00073 int block_debug_setup(void *addr, int len, __u64 off, __u64 id);
00074 int block_debug_check(char *who, void *addr, int len, __u64 off, __u64 id);
00075
